Eigenmumbles

Jekyll

December 15, 2011

Like the new look? I moved my software from webby to jekyll using a theme based on Twitter’s Bootstrap framework. I started from this template and modified someone else’s modified “relevant posts” script to work with tags. Et voila!

Hey, it’s a good break from proposal writing.
